display_long_description:
**DOWNLOAD FOR FREE NOW TO GET YOUR LIMITED EDITION 'TIN FOIL HAT' WHILE SUPPLIES LAST!!**

🦈 You are the Apex Predator.

🦈 Swim, bite and attack in VR using a unique locomotion method that only needs the movement of your head and one controller: look where you want to go, pull the trigger to swim, squeeze the grip button to bite. You won't believe how fluid and dynamic the shark motion is.

🦈 Hunt with groups of up to 10 people online. Eat whatever you can to survive and avoid the zombie sharks: last player standing wins.

🦈 Escape from other sharks, or outmaneuver the survivors to catch them. Use powerups, hide in caves and shipwrecks, and use cannonballs and mines to evade and chase sharks down. 

🦈 There's no pay-to-win so everyone is on equal terms....and if you get tired of eating each other, there are plenty of other things to chomp on, challenges to complete and chests to unlock.

🦈 You can also play with your non-VR friends on the flat-screen version. Each game is a quick snack-sized round so it's perfect to just drop-in or -out whenever you've got a spare minute.

🦈 Visit the Shark Shop, with a rotating inventory of items to buy and wear to express your true shark.

🦈 Sharks is Early Access which means we are constantly adding new updates based on your feedback. Coming soon to SHARKS:

- more game modes
- more levels to explore
- more powerups

🦈 Become Shark.

**DOWNLOAD FOR FREE NOW!!**
